definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Thermal Conductivity of CPVC can be improved obviously by powdered graphite filler.
sentences.chinese: 用石墨填充CPVC可显著提高材料的导热性能。

sentences.english: In addition its excellent conductivity avoids the introduction of temperature gradients.
sentences.chinese: 而碳化硅卓越的导热性则避免了引入温度梯度。

sentences.english: Secondly, the thermal conductivity of heatsink better.
sentences.chinese: 其次，散热片的导热性要好。

sentences.english: High hardness, brittleness, abrasive sharp, good thermal conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 硬度高，脆性大，磨粒锋利，导热性好。

sentences.english: Aluminum core is 1050 pure series with excellent heat conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 中间铝，为1050系列，导热性能好。

sentences.english: In the past the crystallizer was made of a deoxidized copper with a good thermal conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 以往，结晶器是选择导热性良好的脱氧铜制作的。

sentences.english: Aluminum alloy has low specific electrical resistance and high thermal conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 铝合金的电阻很低，而导热性很高。

sentences.english: The invention has simple process, best heat conduction and environmental-friendly process.
sentences.chinese: 本发明工艺制程简单，导热性佳，且工艺环保。

sentences.english: The natural nonctystalline graphite sand has good thermal conductivity and thermal reservasion.
sentences.chinese: 天然无定形石墨砂具有良好的导热性和蓄热性。

sentences.english: And the thermal conductivity is strong and clip a go back on the food of the overheat, easily burn lips.
sentences.chinese: 而且导热性强，夹食过热的食物时，容易烫到嘴唇。

sentences.english: It is significant for industry to study the heat conduction function of compound material .
sentences.chinese: 研究复合材料的导热性能对工业具有十分重要的意义。

sentences.english: Evidence also implicates the crystal structure as a thermal conductivity barrier.
sentences.chinese: 证据还表明晶体结构作为导热性障碍。

sentences.english: Metals are good conductors of heat.

definition: texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
